name: FCollectionTransformSelectionBySizeDataflowNode
doc: Selects pieces based on their size

RangeSetting: Values for the selection has to be inside or outside [Min, Max] range
bInclusive: If true then range includes Min and Max values
bUseRelativeSize: Whether to use the 'Relative Size' -- i.e., the Size / Largest Bone Size. Otherwise, Size is the cube root of Volume.
